module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>log_exceptions`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>log_exceptions` ( `exceptionId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `message` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `code` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `file` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `line` int(11) NOT NULL, `trace` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `previous` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `sqlCode` varchar(10) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `resource` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `env` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `request` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `session` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`exceptionId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `code` (`code`), KEY `file` (`file`), KEY `createdAt` (`createdAt`), KEY `modifiedAt` (`modifiedAt`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
